    # 2. serverless-framwork ë¡œ ì‘ì„±í•œ ì½”ë“œ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ê¸°

    # (1) Panopticon ë°›ê¸°

    narashin/AWS-CloudTrail-Panopticon (opens new window)

    # (2) serverless ì„¤ì¹˜

    $ npm i -g serverless

    # (3) deploy ì „ í™˜ê²½ë³€ìˆ˜ ì„¤ì •í•˜ê¸°

    • serverless.yml ìƒì„±
    service: cloudwatch-ec2-sg

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs12.x
  stage: dev
  region: <Region>
  iamRoleStatements:
    - Effect: "Allow"
      Action:
        - "ec2:DescribeSecurityGroups"
      Resource: "*"
  environment: 
    SLACK_URL: "<ë³´ë‚¼ ì±„ë„ì˜ WEBHOOK_URL>"

functions:
  panopticon:
    handler: handler.panopticon
    events:
      - cloudwatchEvent:
          event:
            source:
              - "aws.ec2"
            detail-type:
              - "AWS API Call via CloudTrail"
            detail:
                eventSource:
                    - "ec2.amazonaws.com"
                eventName:
                    - "CreateSecurityGroup"
                    - "DeleteSecurityGroup"
                    - "RevokeSecurityGroupIngress"
                    - "RevokeSecurityGroupEgress"
                    - "AuthorizesecuritygroupIngress"
                    - "AuthorizesecuritygroupEgress"
    • Nodejs12.x
    • iamRole : "ec2:DescribeSecurityGroups" í—ˆìš©
    • CloudwatchEvent On
      • EC2 Event Source ë“¤
        • "CreateSecurityGroup"
        • "DeleteSecurityGroup"
        • "RevokeSecurityGroupIngress"
        • "RevokeSecurityGroupEgress"
        • "AuthorizesecuritygroupIngress"
        • "AuthorizesecuritygroupEgress"
